content: निकायः [नि-चि-घञ् कुत्वम्] {@--1@} A heap, an assemblage, a class, multitude, flock, group in general; <ls>Mv. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A congregation, school, an association of persons who perform like duties. {@--3@} A house, habitation, dwelling-place; काशीनिकायः &c. {@--4@} The body. {@--5@} Aim, butt, mark. {@--6@} The Supreme Being. {@--7@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Air, wind.
